mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from tb_cellphone_cert where to_char(crt_dt, 'yyyymmddhh24') between to_char(now() - interval'60 minute','yyyymmddhh24') and to_char(now(), 'yyyymmddhh24') and ip_addr = #{ipAddr}
mapper.insert: insert into em_tran (tran_pr, tran_phone, tran_callback, tran_status, tran_date, tran_msg, tran_type) values(#{seqNo}, #{mobileNo}, #{tranCallback}, '1', now(), #{tranMsg}, 4)
insert into tb_cellphone_cert (seq, name, mobile_no, cert_no, ip_addr) values(#{seqNo}, #{memNm}, #{mobileNo}, #{randomStr}, #{ipAddr})
mapper.select: select name as nameNm , mobile_no , cert_no from tb_cellphone_cert where seq = #{seqNo}
